ShortDescription.Value: Highlights pathing routes; residents' workplaces; employees' residences and in-transit commuters; vehicle passenger destinations.

Publish.LongDescription:
New update: * Added display for the count of cims en-route to a selected building on the building info panel * Added key bindings menu
Features Selecting an object applies graphical highlighting to: * The route of the selected object * The routes of all objects en-route to the selected building (experimental) -- this feature is performance-intensive and optimizaztion is a work-in-progress * The routes of all objects passing through a segment (road, ped path, etc) or object (parking lot, transit station, etc -- anything that another object can pass through) * Destinations and routes of all passengers in a selected vehicle (car, train, bus, plane, boat, tram) * Employee residence buildings when selecting a building that contains a workplace * Household members' workplace buildings when selecting a residential building * In-transit employee commuter vehicles / pedestrians when selecting a workplace
Regarding route pathing highlight: This is still experimental. For entities whose route crosses transit types (ex: car -> pedestrian -> subway -> pedestrian), it will highlight the entire route, except for train / subway tracks (it will highlight everything before / after the track, you can see this more easily when zooming out and finding the highlighted stop)
Quick-toggle Controls: * shift+e to deactivate/reactivate all highlighting * shift+v to deactivate/reactivate path routing highlighting * shift+b to deactivate/reactivate building highlighting * shift+r to deactivate/reactivate road traversal highlighting * Additional settings can be accessed from the main menu settings for this mod, or the in-game overlay menu from the button at the top right of the screen * Quick-toggle controls do not change the settings permanently; all other settings persist between games
